ygData.subject: Re: fun with charm
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes, you can.  The caveat is that they will not fight deep reds. I tried to get a wisp to attack a Griffin for the hell of it, but no dice, it just ignored
ygData.messageBody:
> From: Brewhaus <brewhaus@...>
>
> How about this. If you charm a magical being, like a wisp, than have it
> attack, would the thing it is fighting be able to hit it? This could be
> used to take on much higher level creatures that couldn't hit magical.
> Might be a sort of cheat. I don't know.
>
> Aarreran
> Ad Infinitvm
> Mithaniel Marr

Yes, you can. The caveat is that they will not fight deep reds. I tried to
get a wisp to attack a Griffin for the hell of it, but no dice, it just
ignored my commands. On the other hand, I use a wisp to take out Kodiaks
all the time - it is quite hilarious to watch!


Djar Lightbringer(Tarew Marr Server)
Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath
